help-file.title: "PLANE SHIFT"
help-file.content:
Syntax: inn plane <planename> Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
"Plane Shift" transports the caster instantly to another plane of existence. The shift is a one way trip and does now allow for a return home, except by another means of teleportation.
The planes that may be shifted to are:
-The Elemental Plane Of Earth -The Elemental Plane Of Water -The Elemental Plane Of Air -The Elemental Plane Of Fire -The Plane Of Avernus On The Nine Hells -
The Negative Material Plane -
The Ethereal Plane -The Astral Plane
Warning: Shifting can be dangerous, as you just may land on a aggro mob!
